properties.name: io.path
properties.description: Path to the directory holding i/o files.

properties.name: io.scrapeUrlBase
properties.description: The base URL for the archive.org scrape service.

properties.name: io.scrapeUrlQueryKey
properties.description: The query (Q) url parm takes a key/value; io.scrapeUrlQueryKey refers to the key in the key/value parm.

properties.name: io.scrapeUrlFields
properties.description: A list fields to be returned by the scrape service.

properties.name: io.scrapeUrlSorts
properties.description: A list fields and asc|desc designations to tell the scrape service how to sort the data before it is returned.

properties.name: io.metadataUrlBase
properties.description: The base URL for the archive.org metadata service.
